articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Mongolian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Mongolian President
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent a message to Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj on September 2 in reply to his congratulatory message on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 In his reply message Kim Jong Un deeply thanked the president for sending the kindly message on the occasion.
					
					 He expressed belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for FM of DPRK Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for FM of DPRK Distributed as UNSC Official Document
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- A statement issued by a spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK denouncing the U.S. for its occupation of south Korea for 70 years was distributed as the UN Security Council's official document S/2015/689 on September 11.

articles.title: 11th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair to Be Held
articles.content:
11th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair to Be Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The 11th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair is to be held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House from September 21 to 24.
					 The fair will bring together more than 300 companies of the DPRK, Germany, Romania, Malaysia, Mongolia, Switzerland, Singapore, China, Italy, Indonesia, Vietnam, Poland and Taipei of China.
					
					 To be displayed there are the latest products in the fields of metal, machine, electronics, building materials, light industry, agriculture and medicine.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces U.S. and Authorities for Dangerous Biochemical War Moves
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces U.S. and Authorities for Dangerous Biochemical War Moves
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The civic and public measure council for denouncing the illegal introduction and experiment of anthrax germ in south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the south Korean Institute for National Defense Studies on Sept. 9 in protest against the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' dangerous biochemical war moves.
					 It urged the authorities to stop the cooperation with the U.S. and opt for probing the truth behind the introduction of anthrax germ and punish those responsible for it.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan Marked in Tokyo
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan Marked in Tokyo
						
 Tokyo, September 12 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Tokyo on Sept. 5 to mark the 20th anniversary of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan.
					 Present there were Chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan Ho Jong Man, its Vice-Chairman Pak Ku Ho and Economic Director O Min Hak, Chairman of the executive committee for marking the 20th anniversary of Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan Kim Thae Ryong, Chairman of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan Rim Yong Chol, the successive chairpersons, officers and members of the Korean Youth Commercial Association across Japan.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his congratulatory speech that the Korean Youth Commercial Association has made precious successes in the patriotic movement for two decades and called for developing the activities of the association onto a new higher stage in the future. 
					
					 Kim Thae Ryong said that the association developed into a vibrant organization with a regular work system capable of conducting activities for creating the new image of the compatriots' community.
					
					 The association will take up its appearance as an influential youth body steadily carrying forward the tradition of patriotism, and an economic organization promoting the Korean youth's rights and interests and thus fulfill its mission as the main player of the patriotic movement, he noted.
					
					 Earlier, they watched video "20 Years Covered by the Korean Youth Commercial Association".

articles.title: Koreans in China Observe DPRK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in China Observe DPRK's Founding Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China (GAKC) held a meeting in Shenyang, China on September 8 to mark the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the GAKC, said that the DPRK has covered the road of victory and glory for the past 67 years.
					
					 She said that the DPRK has firmly defended the sovereignty of the nation and supreme interests of the country in the protracted confrontation with the U.S. imperialists, defended socialism centred on the popular masses and achieved shining successes in all fields including politics, economy and culture.
					
					 Noting that the international authority and influence of the country have incomparably raised, she added that such miraculous reality would be unthinkable without the independent and popular politics of the government of the DPRK building socialism its own way.
					
					 The participants vowed to dynamically struggle for the prosperity of the country and national reunification, united close around the GAKC under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK Marked by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK Marked by Koreans in China
						
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Koreans in China held celebrations on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the DPRK.
					Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, and other officials of the Association, members of the Liaoning regional association and Shenyang branch of the Association laid a floral basket before the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together in the DPRK Consulate General in Shenyang, China and paid tribute to them.
					
					The Jilin Provincial Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China also held an event of laying a floral basket before the statue of Kim Il Sung at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin.
					
					The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreas in China met at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Sep. 6.
					
					The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute.
					
					A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					The Yanbian regional association of the General Association of Koreans in China also held a celebration in Yanji City, Jilin Province, China on Sept. 9.
					
					Celebration events were also held by Yanji branch, Hunchun branch, Wangqing County branch of the Yanbian regional association.
					
					The speakers praised the feats of the great leaders and said they would turn out as one for the prosperity and national reunification true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					Similar events were also held by other branches of the association.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might" was posted by the Switzerland-Korea Committee on its website on Sep. 1.
					 The work published on Sep. 5, Juche 97 (2008) clarifies that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in adhering to and defending the Juche-oriented idea of President Kim Il Sung on building the state and his exploits and glorifying them forever.

articles.title: Seminars in Foreign Countries Mark DPRK's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Seminars in Foreign Countries Mark DPRK's Birth Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Kyrgyzstan, Bangladesh, Serbia and Benin on Sep. 7 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party, said that thanks to the benevolent and all-embracing politics of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il the DPRK could advance along the road of socialism, consolidating as firm as a rock the politico-ideological unity and cohesion of the popular masses despite the imperialists' persistent moves to stifle it after its founding.
					
					 Personages including M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, said that the President's exploits would be cherished in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also other world progressives along with the century.
					
					 Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, said that the President built the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence and Kim Jong Il defended the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK with his Songun revolutionary leadership and turned it into an invincible socialist fortress and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin who doubles as chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said in his report that it would be impossible to think about Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses without the President's exploits.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Introduce Kim Il Sung's State-Building Exploit
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Introduce Kim Il Sung's State-Building Exploit
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups illustrated with the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung to the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The Sep. 4th issue of the Russian newspaper Rio Panorama said in its article titled "Founder of the DPRK":
					
					 The President pioneered the road of building the people's power defending the interests of the working people and realizing them from an independent stand, not bound to an established theory and experience gained by other countries.
					
					 He established the people's revolutionary governments in guerilla bases during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and, based on its historical root, set forth the line of building the country suited to the specific conditions of Korea after liberating the country.
					
					 He also made sure that the overall democratic reforms were successfully enforced, firmly consolidating the socio-economic foundation of new Korea.
					
					 The President founded the DPRK, the first people's democratic country in the East through the all-Korea general election.
					
					 On the same day, the Lao newspaper Pasason carried an article to praise the President's state-building exploit.
					
					 The Sep. issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Iskra said that in the DPRK there is a genuine socialist system guaranteeing the political rights and stable life of the working people.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported in Portugal
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported in Portugal
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- A "resolution for supporting the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation" was adopted at the 39th festival of Avante, organ of the Communist Party of Portugal, on Sep. 6.
					 The resolution said that coming Oct. 10 is a significant day marking the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK. It went on:
					
					 The WPK led the Korean revolution and socialist construction to victory, regarding the Juche idea as its guidelines for a long period and made great contributions to the accomplishment of the global cause of independence.
					
					 The Korean people turned out as one in the struggle for defending the country and building socialism while smashing the extreme moves of the U.S. imperialists and hostile forces to stifle it and ignite a new war and registered proud successes. Their struggle and successes are instilling great faith and courage into the progressive political parties and people loving independence and justice and aspiring after socialism.
					
					 We, participants of the 39th festival of Avante, availing ourselves of this opportunity, extend full support and solidarity to the friendly WPK and the Korean people in their heroic struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and realizing the country's reunification.

articles.title: Vietnamese Figure Extends Firm Solidarity to Korean People
articles.content:
Vietnamese Figure Extends Firm Solidarity to Korean People
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The 3rd meeting and friendly meeting of the Hai Duong Provincial Committee of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association took place on Sep. 4.
					 The chairman of the above-said committee said at the meeting:
					
					 The DPRK's founding would have been unthinkable without the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman warmly congratulated the DPRK on registering big successes on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of its founding and extended support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for building socialism and reunifying the country.
					
					 The traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries personally provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung and continuously developed by the efforts of the two parties, states and peoples are a precious treasure to them, he said.
					
					 He vowed to make more positive efforts to develop the friendly relations between Vietnam and the DPRK, in the future.

articles.title: Three Charters of National Reunification Supported in Europe
articles.content:
Three Charters of National Reunification Supported in Europe
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the European region took place in Helsinki on Sep. 5 to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and 70 years since the U.S. occupation of south Korea.
					 Present at the meeting were delegates of the political parties and organizations of the European countries including Finland, Sweden, Denmark, France and Poland and figures of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the meeting, a report made by the chairman of the Finland-Korea Society was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers lauded the great leaders for their immortal exploits performed in founding the DPRK and strengthening and developing it.
					
					 They strongly urged the U.S. to withdraw its forces from south Korea and expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their cause of national reunification.
					
					 A congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 A joint resolution was also adopted there.
					
					 The resolution said:
					
					 This year marks not only the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation but also 70 years since Korea's division due to the U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea.
					
					 Korea's division, the outcome of the imperialists' policy of aggression, has continued so long.
					
					 We appeal to all the progressive forces in Europe to extend positive support to the three charters of national reunification advanced by Kim Il Sung and formulated by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: First Meeting of British Preparatory Committee Held
articles.content:
First Meeting of British Preparatory Committee Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The first meeting of the British preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place at the building of the New Communist Party of Britain on Sept. 7.
					 The meeting set the celebration period from mid-September to October 10 and decided to organize a meeting, a film show and a book and photo exhibition during the period.
					
					 It also decided to carry works of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on party organs and post them on websites, issue special edition and carry special write-ups on media so as to splendidly celebrate the founding anniversary of the WPK.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- There took place a reception at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on September 10 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Present there on the invitation were figures of the government ministries, parliament, political parties, institutions and organizations including the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the State Duma, the Federation Council, Ministry of Defense, Ministry of Development of Far East, Ministry of Economy and Development, the Ministry of Agriculture, Ministry of Education and Science, Ministry of Culture, Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, Communist Party of the Russian Federation, A Just Russia, Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, Communist Party of Soviet Union, Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Russian Railways Company, Academy of Sciences and Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the photos documenting the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
